document_data.name: ''Ring of Truth Telling''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of truth telling''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[ring]] that helped the wearer to detect when someone was lying to them.
document_data.Powers: The ''ring of truth telling'' did not automatically detect lies (unlike the ''[[ring of truth]]''), but instead enhanced the wearer's insight into the honesty of others.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Jarlaxle]] possessed a ''ring of truth telling'' during his visits to [[Waterdeep]] the late 15{{th}} century DR.
